settings.deleteReason4: I am not satisfied with the content

settings.healthScoreHealthy: Your account is in good health. Continue to follow community guidelines.
settings.healthScoreMedium: Your account is moderate. You can improve your score by following the rules.
settings.healthScoreRisk: Your account is at risk. It is strongly recommended to follow community guidelines.
settings.healthScoreExplanation: Feedim aims to build a respectful and safe community. The algorithm considers many factors including content quality, community engagement, account reliability, and compliance with rules. Make sure your information is accurate, avoid overusing certain features, and be respectful to other users. Feedim tracks all your activity and determines your profile score based on all your behavior. To keep your account healthy, follow community guidelines and be a valuable member.
settings.healthLearnMore: Learn more about the profile score system
settings.healthNsfwDesc: Sharing adult content that violates community guidelines
settings.healthSpamDesc: Repetitive, misleading or unwanted content sharing
settings.healthRule1: Violations are detected by Feedim AI and sent to the moderation team.
settings.healthRule2: After moderator approval, a strike is added to the relevant category.
settings.healthRule3: You can avoid strikes by following community guidelines.
settings.locationNotSupported: Your browser does not support geolocation

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Feedim
privacy.description: Feedim privacy policy. Learn how your personal data is collected and protected.

about.title: About Us - Feedim
about.description: Learn about Feedim. Discover and share - content and video platform.

contact.title: Contact - Feedim
contact.description: Get in touch with Feedim. Reach us for your questions, feedback, and support requests.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines - Feedim
communityGuidelines.description: Feedim community guidelines. Respectful communication, original content, spam prohibition, violation sanctions, and reporting process.

refundPolicy.title: Refund and Cancellation Policy - Feedim
refundPolicy.description: Feedim refund and cancellation policy. Coin and premium membership refund conditions.

paymentSecurity.title: Payment Security - Feedim
paymentSecurity.description: Feedim payment security information. SSL encryption, 3D Secure verification, and PCI-DSS compliant payment infrastructure.

distanceSales.title: Distance Sales Contract - Feedim
distanceSales.description: Feedim platform distance sales contract. Coin and premium membership purchase conditions.

preInformation.title: Pre-Information Form - Feedim
preInformation.description: Feedim platform pre-information form. Consumer information before distance sale.

copyright.title: Copyright Protection - Feedim
copyright.description: Information about Feedim's copyright protection system, duplicate content policy, and copyright complaint process.

moderation.title: Moderation System - Feedim
moderation.description: How does Feedim's moderation system work? Information about AI-powered content scanning, community reports, appeal process, and moderation categories.

ai.title: Feedim AI - Feedim
ai.description: Information about Feedim's AI-powered content moderation, security system, SEO generation, and copyright scanning.

contentTypes.title: Content Types - Feedim
contentTypes.description: Content types you can share on Feedim: post, video, and moment. Features, limits, and creation steps for each content type.

coins.title: Token and Balance System - Feedim
coins.description: Information about Feedim's token and balance system. Earning tokens, purchasing, withdrawing, daily limits, and usage areas.

earning.title: Earning Money - Feedim
earning.description: How to earn money on Feedim? Earning sources, token system, cash withdrawal process, and tips to increase your earnings.

analytics.title: Analytics - Feedim
analytics.description: Feedim Analytics Panel: A detailed statistics panel for Premium members. Views, likes, comments, earnings, peak hours, and top posts.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing - Feedim
dataSharing.description: Feedim data sharing policy. Third-party access, payment data, cookies, data retention periods, and KVKK rights.

accessRestrictions.title: Access Restrictions - Feedim
accessRestrictions.description: Access restrictions on the Feedim platform, age limit, geographic restrictions, account verification, premium features, and moderation rules.

accessibility.title: Accessibility - Feedim
accessibility.description: Feedim accessibility features. Theme support, responsive design, keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, and WCAG standards.

profileScore.title: Profile Score System - Feedim
profileScore.description: What is the profile trust score, how is it calculated and why does it matter.
